title: Pvp.net kernal is not responding
body:
Reinstalling didn't help.

I'm even getting "This site canâ€™t be reached" when browsing this website.

Wtf?

replies.body: These errors are usually caused by permissions settings blocking game files from being scanned or read.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to adjust that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
